author: craigmcc
msg: Hand patch to the Maven generated build.xml file to declare Ant properties
for the JavaMail and Java Activation Framework JAR files.  This allows us
to declare "file:" URLs pointing to a locally installed copy of these packages.
With this change, Commons Email now compiles again; however, there are still
test failures on my system (Linux) that prevent the "ant clean dist" executed
by the nightly build from completing successfully.

author: mdiggory
msg: No longer inheriting commons-build. Something I do not beleive we do anymore due to the problems with building src distribution tarballs.

author: mdiggory
msg: Setting appropriate site generation path,it was never set, or was attempted to be inherited from commons-build. Something I do not beleive we do anymore due to the problems with building src distribution tarballs.

author: mdiggory
msg: Fixes to correct site generation and Jakarta Commons style.
4.) added greybar links back to Commons Home page and Jakarta Homepage
